PARTICULE-FX.Settings.autoEmission.label: Automatic emission
PARTICULE-FX.Settings.autoEmission.descr: Auto-generate emissions when using an item with a target.
PARTICULE-FX.Settings.Avoid.label: Avoid particle emissions
PARTICULE-FX.Settings.Avoid.description: Don't show particles from other clients (useful for lower configurations).
PARTICULE-FX.Settings.doubleSizeElevatio: Number of elevation grids to double the size of the particles (if 0, the size doesn't change).
PARTICULE-FX.Settings.Persist.label: Save emitters
PARTICULE-FX.Settings.Persist.descriptio: Save unfinished emitters in the scene when changing. Reload them when returning to the scene.
PARTICULE-FX.Settings.minRole.label: Minimal role for custom template
PARTICULE-FX.Settings.minRole.descriptio: Minimal role required to create or delete new custom prefill templates.
